name: Hell Nighter
description:
After a year long wait for the third edition of the Sherbrooke Game Jam, you have the honorable duty of managing the event!

However, everyone here isn't here to make a game -- but THE game of the year in 48 hours, out of admiration for the honorable crunch culture. It is now your job to satiate the demands and woes of the developers! You will:

Feed them pizza, repair the beer fountain, flush the toilet, repair the Wifi and appease flame with your handy extinguisher. It does not get easier as time goes on, so be prepared, or suffer the consequences...
